name: Green Energy
overview:
The company “Green Energy Systems” is working in the field of Non-Conventional Energy since year 2004 having collaboration with like minded peoples having interest in Energy Solutions.

Our Products: Biogas Plant Solar Product Solar Security System Solar Lawn Lamp Solar Flood Light Solar Camera & Video Door Phone Solar Induction Lamp Non Conventional Energy System Domestic Wind Mill olar Inverter

Our Team: Being a leading manufacturer, we comprehend the fact that it is essential to have a skilled team of professionals in order to meet the bulk demands of our clients.

Our Quality: We are a client centric organization and ensure to offer quality assured range of solar products to our clients. Our quality controllers ensure that raw material used in the production process as well as the finished products on well defined parameters to assure flawless range to our clients.

Our Infrastructure; We have a well built and state-of-the-art infrastructure, which is the backbone of our organization. It is spread across a green lush area and well integrated with advance machines and equipment.]

Our Facilities: We have a state-of-the-art infrastructure at our premise in order to manufacture quality assured range solar products. Our infrastructure houses latest facilities in form of manufacturing unit, designing unit, research unit and quality testing unit.

Client Satisfaction: A leading organization, we are client centric in nature and ensure to offer quality assured range of solar products to our clients. We have been able to maximize the satisfaction of our clients by offering quality products, cost effective prices, timely delivery of products and easy payment options.
